name: Pick Up a Cube Simulator
description:
Made by a 13-year-old indie developer.

You pick up a cube, and that's it.

Due to the really good quality room model, it might take a while to load and on some computers may be slow/laggy.

I'm bad at art, modeling, and music so thanks to https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/mini-project-bedroom-on-sketchfab-3f8d37058c894a... the room looks nice.

Special thanks to the forums and documentation, I may be good at programming but even a programmer gets confused.
